================================================================================

Total Entries: 13 journal + 13 standup = 26 files
Date Range: Nov 25, 2024 â†’ Feb 10, 2025 (~78 days)
Coverage: 13 days with entries, 65 days gaps
Longest Gap: 22 days (Nov 26 - Dec 18)

Gap Types:
1. Boundary test gap (22 days) - tests near 30-day window limit
2. Holiday break (16 days) - realistic winter holiday scenario
3. Extended vacation (19 days) - realistic international vacation
4. Single day (1 day) - tests adjacent-day fallback
5. Weekends (2 days) - tests weekend handling

Search Window Test Cases:
- Within window: Any date Jan 6-Feb 5 should find entries
- Near boundary: Dec 19 is 18 days before Jan 6 (within window)
- At boundary: Nov 25 is 42 days before Jan 6 (outside window)
- After gap: Searching Jan 9 should find Jan 8
- After vacation: Searching Jan 30 should find Jan 14 (16 days back)

Link Fixing Scenarios:
- Standard adjacent: Jan 7 â†’ Jan 6 (Yesterday), Jan 7 â†’ Jan 8 (Tomorrow)
- Gap handling: Jan 8 â†’ Jan 10 (Tomorrow, skipping Jan 9)
- Weekend skip: Jan 10 â†’ Jan 13 (skipping weekend)
- Holiday links: Dec 20 â†’ Jan 6 ("Return from Holiday")
- Vacation links: Jan 14 â†’ Feb 3 ("Before Vacation" / "After Vacation")

Goals Copying Test Cases (Feb 3-5, Feb 10):
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Week 1 (Feb 3-9):
- Feb 3 (Mon): Initial Goals of the Week and Goals of the Day
  * Goals of the Day has mix: [ ] unchecked, [x] checked, plain bullets
- Feb 4 (Tue): Same week - should copy Goals of the Week
  * Should also copy unfinished Goals of the Day from Feb 3
  * Includes: [ ] unchecked items and plain bullets
  * Excludes: [x] completed items
- Feb 5 (Wed): Same week - should copy Goals of the Week
  * Should copy unfinished Goals of the Day from Feb 4

Week 2 (Feb 10-16):
- Feb 10 (Mon): NEW WEEK - should NOT copy Goals of the Week from Feb 5
  * Should still copy unfinished Goals of the Day from last entry (Feb 5)
  * Tests week boundary: same week vs. different week behavior
